title: CANT LOGIN
body:
All my accounts are not able to log in, keeps giving me that invalid username/password. anyone else getting this???? 

p.s NO I HAVNT ACTUALLY FORGOTTEN MY USER/PASS

replies.body: Same problem. I can't login despite spamming 1000 times for half an hour. It keeps saying 'incorrect username or password' though they are correct
Ps: I am able to login here then why can't I login in there?
Try spam clicking the login button with your info entered, just worked for me.
Yeah getting the same, just wait for a fix I guess.
